Tooltip: Makes a GET request to the QueueItems endpoint and returns all QueueItems matching the declared statuses.

Arguments.Name: Queue
Arguments.Tooltip: The Queue from which Queue Items will be retrieved.

Arguments.Name: QueueItems
Arguments.Tooltip: The Queue Items retrieved from the Queue.

Arguments.Name: Statuses
Arguments.Tooltip: An array of QueueItemDtoStatus values. This is used to filter the Queue Items returned by the activity. By default, New and InProgress statuses are included; provide your own array of values to overwrite the default.

Arguments.Name: StartProcessingDate
Arguments.Tooltip: DateTime used to filter results received based on what time and date they were processed.
